Window.setMinSize

Function/Meaning
Sets the minimum window size
Type
Method of the Window class
Syntax
setMinSize(width, height)
Arguments
width Specifies the minimum width of the window. Specifying 0 removes the limit.
height Specifies the minimum height of the window. Specifying 0 removes the limit.
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Specifies the minimum size of the window. The window cannot be made smaller than the size specified by this method.
Reference
Window.setMaxSize
Window.setSize
Window.minWidth
Window.minHeight
